snippet.title: Qasir al-Wasat: International Edition - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/296030
http://qasirgame.com/delve
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/qasiralwasat_intnl_storefront

Available on January 19th 2016 the International Edition of Qasir al-Wasat features stealth gameplay in a gorgeously crafted 12th century Syrian palace riddled with puzzles, traps and mysteries.

    Stealth     Action     Arabian     Tale

Fully localized in: Czech, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese and Russian;
30+ Achievements;
Keyboard and gamepad fully supported.

More info at http://QasirGame.com

Music by Matt Lopes.
Narration by Kamran Nikad.

❤ 2012 2016 Aduge / Zueira Digital
